comments.body: I know this is a tiny thing, but we should probably make a script for it. I know I've definitely messed this up in subtle ways before.
agreed, and I messed up the tag comment for 2.3.3 today as well, this could either be Jenkinsised or put into a script but I don't see an obvious path yet

### 4. Update _src/node_version.h_

comments.body: I still don't actually trust `--start-ref` to work correctly haha.

there's been two major revisions to how it works since early on and I find it quite reliable now. I used it for 2.3.2 because the new 3.0.0-rc1 patch got in the way and it worked perfectly using the exact command above, it just didn't trim off the release commit and "working on" commit but that's by design with `--start-ref`
